strapiGuide.title: Guide to Pizza Places in Bentonville, Arkansas
strapiGuide.description: Looking for delicious pizza in Bentonville, Arkansas? Look no further! From Priato Pizzeria's artisan-crafted, Neapolitan-style pizzas to Pedaler's Pub's wood-fired pies, we've got something for every pizza lover. Don't miss Oven & Tap's amazing pizzas and appetizers, or Tavola Trattoria's classic Margherita and unique U District and Tavola pies. For a slice of New York-style pizza, check out Johnny Brusco's or Slice. Or grab a slice and a cold beer at Slice, located right next to Bentonville Dive. Satisfy your pizza cravings at one of these fantastic pizzerias in Bentonville, Arkansas today!
strapiGuide.content:
Looking for some delicious pizza in Bentonville, Arkansas? Look no further! From the artisan-crafted, Neapolitan-style pizzas at Priato Pizzeria to the wood-fired pies at Pedaler's Pub, there's something for every pizza lover in Bentonville. Don't miss Oven & Tap's amazing pizzas and delicious appetizers, or Tavola Trattoria's classic Margherita and unique U District and Tavola pies. And for a slice of New York-style pizza, be sure to check out Johnny Brusco's or Slice. Or grab a slice and a cold beer at Slice, located right next to Bentonville Dive. So come on down and enjoy some of the best pizza in Arkansas!

Bentonville

Oven & Tap

üìç 215 S Main St #3

Photo courtesy of Oven & Tap

This is an NWA Daily top pick! The owners‚Äô attention to detail in the atmosphere, menu, and ingredients are noticed throughout the dining experience. Starting with cocktails and appetizers is a must! (Hello, Pimento Cheese and Edamame!) Save room for their amazing pizzas (you can‚Äôt go wrong with the famous Sweet Joe)! This is the perfect spot for date night or an evening with friends.

Instagram, Facebook


Pedaler's Pub

üìç 410 SW A St

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

Fun, laid back atmosphere with a great patio‚Ä¶ perfect stop on your bike ride! They offer thin crust, wood fire pizza and have a full list of yummy appetizers and drinks!

Instagram, Facebook


Priato Pizzeria

üìç 211 NE A St

Photo courtesy of Hangry Peddler

This food truck is located in the heart of Downtown Bentonville. We highly recommend on a nice day. These artisan-crafted, Neapolitan-style pizza are made fresh and fast.

Facebook


Johnny Brusco‚Äôs New York Style Pizza

üìç ‚Äã‚Äã700 SE Walton Blvd #10

Photo courtesy of Johnny Brusco's

These New York style pizzas are great for dine in, carry out, or delivery. On Tuesdays, catch the $1 cheese slice after 4pm.

Facebook


Tavola Trattoria

üìç 108 SE A St

Photo courtesy of Tavola Trattoria

Known for their amazing italian pastas, people usually pass over the pizza offering‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt be a victim to this and try the Tavola and the U District Pizza. You also can‚Äôt go wrong with their classic Margherita. They are located in the heart of downtown Bentonville.

Instagram, Facebook


Slice

üìç 115 NW 2nd St

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

New kids on the block and definitely worth a visit. They offer New York style pizza with dough and sauce homemade daily from a family recipe. This food truck is located right next to Bentonville Dive so you can enjoy a slice of delicious pizza with a cold beer.

Instagram


Loafin Joe's

üìç 801 SE 8th St

Photo courtesy of Loafin Joe's

A food truck at 8th Street Market near downtown Bentonville. See above description of Loafin Joe's in Fayetteville to see more details

Instagram, Facebook

Thanks for joining us on this delicious tour of the best pizza in Bentonville, Arkansas! From the artisan-crafted, Neapolitan-style pizzas at Priato Pizzeria to the wood-fired pies at Pedaler's Pub, there's something for every pizza lover in Bentonville. Don't miss Oven & Tap's amazing pizzas and delicious appetizers, or Tavola Trattoria's classic Margherita and unique U District and Tavola pies. And for a slice of New York-style pizza, be sure to check out Johnny Brusco's or Slice. Or grab a slice and a cold beer at Slice, located right next to Bentonville Dive. So next time you're craving a slice (or an entire pie) in Bentonville, be sure to check out one of these fantastic pizzerias. Thanks for reading, and happy eating!
